select * from sys_org
and `name` like CONCAT('%',#{user.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and `code` like CONCAT('%',#{user.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and manager like CONCAT('%', #{org.manager,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and manager_id = #{org.managerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
and tel like CONCAT('%',#{org.tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and status = #{org.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select so.id, so.create_time, so.pid, so.name, so.code, so.manager_id, so.status, su.name as manager from sys_org so left join sys_user su on so.manager_id = su.id
and so.name like CONCAT('%',#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and su.name like CONCAT('%', #{manager,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
